SELECT TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'DAY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = ''KOREAN''') AS x, ROUND(AVG(HVEC), 2) AS y FROM EMERGENCY_DATA_TBL
HPID = '${hpid}'
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'DAY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = ''KOREAN'''), TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'D') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'D'))

SELECT TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'HH24') AS x, ROUND(AVG(HVEC), 2) AS y FROM EMERGENCY_DATA_TBL
HPID = '${hpid}'
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'HH24') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'HH24'))

SELECT TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'DAY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = ''KOREAN''') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'AM') AS x, ROUND(AVG(HVEC), 2) AS y FROM EMERGENCY_DATA_TBL
HPID = '${hpid}'
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'DAY', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE = ''KOREAN'''), TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'D'), TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'AM') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'D')), TO_CHAR(SAVE_TIME, 'AM')
